mapper.select: SELECT m.id as "id", m.user_id as "user_id", m.num as "num", m.name_cn as "name_cn", m.name_en as "name_en", m.detailed_address as "detailed_address", m.phone as "phone", m.integral as "integral", m.all_integral as "all_integral", m.merchant_portrait_url as "merchant_portrait_url", m.certification_level as "certification_level", m.fund as "fund", m.describing_img1_url as "describing_img1_url", m.describing_img2_url as "describing_img2_url", m.describing_img3_url as "describing_img3_url", m.describing_img4_url as "describing_img4_url", m.business_license as "business_license", m.business_license_url as "business_license_url" FROM t_merchant_information m WHERE m.deleted = '0' and m.id = #{merchantId}
mapper.update: update t_merchant_information set describing_img1_url = #{describingImg1Url}, describing_img2_url = #{describingImg2Url}, describing_img3_url = #{describingImg3Url}, describing_img4_url = #{describingImg4Url} WHERE deleted = '0' and id = #{id}
